snippet: A New York advertising firm has chosen two ideas from a crowdsourcing competition, including one that will give employees 4,500 square feet of office space for personal projects.
abstract: Stuart Elliott Advertising column observes outcome and initiatives of New York advertising firm Kirshenbaum Bond Senecal & Partners crowdsourcing competition, including one winner that will give employees 4,500 square feet of office space for personal projects.
lead_paragraph: A New York advertising firm has chosen two ideas from a crowdsourcing competition, including one that will give employees 4,500 square feet of office space for personal projects.

headline.seo: Advertising Agency Crowdsources Its Own Morale
headline.main: An Ad Agency Crowdsources Its Own Employees’ Morale
headline.print_headline: An Ad Agency Crowdsources Its Own Employees’ Morale
